name: 11ty-boilerplate
description: My Eleventy boilerplate project, w/ Alpine, Tailwind and Browserify

scripts.start-dev: browserify entry.js -o src/common-js/bundle.js & rimraf ./_site & ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=false eleventy --serve & postcss src/styles/tailwind.css --o _tmp/style.css --watch
scripts.build-prod: browserify entry.js -o src/common-js/bundle.js & rimraf ./_site & ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true eleventy & postcss src/styles/tailwind.css --o _site/css/style.css

author: Stephen Zappia
